name: Writ
author: Levi
desc:
You engrave onto a surface a mystical set of symbols and shapes that convey a message. As you cast this spell, describe one or more creatures that this message is intended for, and what your message is. This message must be 15 words or less.

The encoded message will appear as indecipherable abstract nonsense to any creature except the intended recipient(s) and the caster.

If the surface is disrupted or destroyed, the message is also lost.
